purpose: The email is a call for papers for the 28th Brazilian Symposium on Formal Methods (SBMF 2025), inviting submissions of original research related to formal methods. It provides important dates for paper registration and submission, as well as guidelines for submissions and topics of interest. The symposium will take place in Recife, Brazil, from December 3-5, 2025.
evidence_sentences: SBMF 2025: 28th Brazilian Symposium on Formal Methods
We invite submissions of papers with a strong emphasis on formal methods
Papers should present unpublished and original work that has a clear contribution to the state-of-the-art on the theory and practice of formal methods.
